column1: Kata Robata////Loved the ambiance and how clean the restaurant is. My boyfriend and I came right before happy hour when the restaurant started to get busy. Service was good but a little slow probably because of how busy they got. My boyfriend and I ordered a lot of sashimi/sushi (salmon belly
column4: ikura) and quality was GREAT! We also got the bone marrow which was AMAZING. The wagyu beef was also very delicious. If you're looking for good sushi with quality
